reviews.review_msg: She was sweet but a tough grader. Always open to helping, and being nice. Evens out how awful the lecture prof was.

She is a very good prof. Easy to get a high mark if the assigned readings are done prior to class. Keeps the readings short and relevant. Guest lecture is quite boring but important for the final. Tries to keep class interesting by dropping related facts now and then. Overall awesome prof and a good course
